website_summaries.verdict: While a little smaller than buyers expected, this is a great looking and sturdy console that works well in a smaller room or an apartment.
pros: Fireplace is realistic and produces a lot of heat
cons: Assembly is not difficult, but is time consuming (2 to 3 hours), particularly if you use the included, flimsy tools
Some buyers had issues with it arriving with broken parts

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this! I purchased another one of these fireplace / TV stands from another company and had problem after problem with the transaction. The order ended up getting cancelled by the seller for no apparent reason. I was less than pleased when I had to begin my search again, but this TV stand and fireplace transaction was a breeze! I was happy with the quality of it, shelving and room to store, functionality, and quality. It was extremely easy to assemble, too. The directions were clear and concise and did not frustrate me. Good purchase and I'm glad the other fireplace didn't work out honestly!
customer_reviews.author: K. Poling

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and good quality material for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and good quality material for the price. There was 1 step during assembly that was impossible to do with the tools they listed, but otherwise pretty easy although time consuming to put it together. Fireplace has two switches for the visual and heat. Storage space fits my game consoles and controllers with ease. 42" TV is a pretty good fit, but I am planning to buy a swiveling foot for the TV.
customer_reviews.author: TheyKeepOnRising

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made. It was very easy to put together and heats my living room nicely! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, a step up from college furniture.
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled it when it came. He was actually quite impressed at how clear the directions were written (considering other furniture items we've boughten on Amazon) and it did go together smoothy. The only issue we had is if you leave just the fireplace on (not the fan) then you can hear a click noise from the rotation of the light after awhile. It's not noticeable if the heater is on or if you have music/tv playing. Thats the only reason I doc it a star as it happened the second time we turned on the fireplace. Perfect for a small living room apartment but I'm not sure it would look right in a large open living room.
customer_reviews.author: Troi

customer_reviews.title: I want to rate higher, I really do but the quality is not there
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, really. It looks fake for sure but it definitely makes a room more homey. The problem I have is how easily it's damaged. It must have like the thinnest layer of paint on it because if I even breathe too hard on the wood, the paint chips off. It's also super expensive to run. My electric bill the first month we had it was terrifying. I'd say spend a little more and get something of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it and have had it now for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality and very heavy/sturdy. Absolutely love it and have had it now for 2 years. I wanted to wait and see how it held up before writing review and it's still in perfect condition. Rather easy to assemble but took about 2-3 hours. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Printz

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tv stand
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tv stand. The assembly was ok but it could have been waaaaaayyyyy better if you all placed stronger tools inside but other than that no complaints with the product. I love turning the fire on and how the mood in the room changes, its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexus

customer_reviews.title: Reading by the fire ...
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to an apartment and wanted evenings by the fire ! Laughed about trying an electric fireplace ... but this does the job! It is realistic enough, and when the blower is on ... heat is actually generated. It was easy to assemble and looks great, Have spent many enjoyable hours with my electric fire and a good book!
customer_reviews.author: Tomiko T.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond satisfied with this fireplace tv stand.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this!!!! I received it faster than expected. Great price. Awesome all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its kind of small but we like it its in my living room and my living ...
customer_reviews.text: its kind of small but we like it its in my living room and my living room is small so it works.. i got a big painting to put on top not a tv. it adds a great look to our house. i highly recommend if your living room is small or you want for your bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice! A lot of assembly. I didn't realize it didn't have a remote or thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: RJM2

customer_reviews.title: A great product for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the tv room for look and functionality. Easy to assemble taking me about an hour to finish. Small problem with heater function which was rectified in two days. We really enjoy the unit for its looks and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 75in Samsung Flat screen that takes up the entire thing but it works wonderfully and the heat it gives off goes straight out instead of up which is super important!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT UNLESS COMES ASSEMBLED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This should not look like this only after 2 years of having this!! I VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT!! Not sturdy at all!! The parts it cake with were NOT THE RIGHT SIZE!!
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece. 4 stars because there is only one ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece. 4 stars because there is only one heat option and no remote. Very nice addition to any room. Make sure you have time to assemble and additional tools than what it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not awful but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but it looks pretty. I’m actually afraid to move it when we move out. I have a sneaking suspicion that it’s gonna collapse... stay tuned I guess
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Its a Eh with a little mhmm.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought I would love! This tv stand on the other hand I absolutely hate it! The assembly was a pain and the screw locks would come undone half the time and I would have to do it again. They would not stay locked! Other than the time it took to put together I would say it’s a pretty ok stand.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Traxler

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It actually puts out more heat than ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It actually puts out more heat than I expected and warms up our house nicely. Very good quality and was pretty simple to build.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great price for stand
customer_reviews.text: My wife was happy with the fireplace stand. It is a decent size. Everything worked fine. It took my cousin about 1 hour to put the stand together.
customer_reviews.author: JASON G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Looks really cozy in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Appel

customer_reviews.title: This is better than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.text: This TV cabinet was easy to assemble and looks very nice. The fireplace insert was much better than I expected, as it is larger and the fire effect is very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Desertrog

customer_reviews.title: its barely better than any Ikea product
customer_reviews.text: its barely better than any Ikea product. cheap composite "wood". put it in a dark corner so you don't see it during the daytime. the fire thing looks pretty at night is about all I can say about it. even half price would be more than it is worth. don't buy
customer_reviews.author: gregor rohlsson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I got my product in the mail today and when I went to put it together th Maine board was cracked!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: I love this entertainment center and the heat feature works great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this entertainment center and the heat feature works great for warming up the basement. I didn't give it 5 stars because there was a crack in one of the pieces. I was able to glue it and make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice unit, wasn't near as hard to assemble as I first thought. very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: rick haas

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful in my home
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy! Make sure you have someone to help you carry & assemble this piece. Very beautiful in my home. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: They were very nice. I'm extremely happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Had a piece broken when it arrived. Seller fixed the problem ASAP. They were very nice. I'm extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Heats up a large area
customer_reviews.text: I wish you could change the temperature and it would better with a remote. Overall it’s a great fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dial

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Fire is so soothing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Fire is so soothing. Exactly what i wanted! Easy to put together also. Did it all by myself
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hallermeier

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this fireplace tv stand! It is sturdy, beautiful, and had easy to follow instructions. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: sia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as i expected but still love it. Also small dip in the middle, normally when something is to heavy and weighs it down. However my tv meets requirements in weight
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Too much work
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase this be ready to assemble. So many pieces. It's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and easy to put together! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed there are 2 cracks in the wood pieces directly ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed there are 2 cracks in the wood pieces directly in the front were it is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great and puts out a surprising amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my TV stand with Fireplace. Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture sturdy well built, great price, great conversation piece watching the electric fireplace.. Love It
customer_reviews.author: John T. Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell you how much I LOVE this stand
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell you how much I LOVE this stand! It's very nicely made & it's modern with a cozy twist!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Nice and perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Nice and perfect for apartment living. Heats my apartment very well and gives it a nice and cozy feel. We get so many compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

product_meta.title: Home Accent Furnishings Lucas 58 Inch TV Stand with Fireplace in Black
product_meta.description: Enjoy a warm, comfortable space in any room of your home with this media stand with electric fireplace. Made from high-grade MDF with a durable laminate finish that can hold flat panel Televisions up to 58 inches. Features adjustable shelving to fit your components and a cable management system. Installation requires no technician, simply plug into standard household outlet and no venting required.
feature_bullets: Includes electric fireplace insert, no electrician required, simple plug-in unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
